title: Churchill: voice of a prophet
creator_credit: Don Thompson, New York Times Productions and Nielsen-Ferns
brief_description: Examines Churchill’s life immediately after the Second World War and his loss to Labour in the general election; his predictions of the dangers of the Soviet Bloc; his anti Soviet speeches throughout the USA; his visits to India in 1947 for the granting of independence; his return as Prime Minister in 1951 and his death in 1965. Narrated by Henry Fonda. Suitable for upper secondary level.
